evidence.claim: AmeriStaff uses AWS for cloud infrastructure.
They are compliant with HIPAA regulations as indicated on their site.
AmeriStaff employs FHIR standards for healthcare data exchange.
Integration patterns include data synchronization between EHRs and cloud services.
EDI transaction sets are utilized for processing claims in healthcare services.

icp.icp_reason: Engaged in healthcare staffing, likely involves claims processing and eligibility checks.
